SINT_Execution_Output.Summary: FD and SINT prompt synthesized via Debates (N=4) with Scenario 3B (Consensus). Four downstream tasks prepared for Cases 2–5.

Task.title: Grid-Scale Battery Siting: Reliability, Cost, and Environmental Justice
Task.objective: Run a conflict debate to balance reliability gains, lifecycle cost, and EJ constraints when siting grid-scale batteries.
Task.context: Locational marginal pricing, transformer limits, fire codes, land-use policy, community exposure.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3A (Conflict), ≥2 rounds with Divergence Ratings and compromise synthesis.
Task.experts: - Power Systems Reliability Engineer - Energy Markets and Cost Analyst - Environmental Justice Policy Advocate
Task.constraints: PCG; numeric ratings each round; cross-evaluation; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Prioritized siting principles and guardrails with KPIs.

Task.title: University Micro-credential Framework
Task.objective: Integrate academic quality, employability, and accessibility into a consensus framework for micro-credentials.
Task.context: Stackability, accreditation, employer partnerships, tuition models, student support.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3B (Consensus); integrate and prioritize without criticism.
Task.experts: - Academic Quality Lead - Career Services and Employer Relations - Student Success and Accessibility Officer
Task.constraints: PCG; ratings and cross-evaluation at Step 2; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Policy set with measurable targets and review cadence.

Task.title: Secure Prompt Management Protocol for Enterprise LLMs
Task.objective: Use Generator+Critic to create a secure prompt management protocol (versioning, access, redaction, audit) for enterprise LLMs.
Task.context: Prompt libraries, secrets handling, access control, change control, auditability.
Task.methodology: Generator + External Critic (N=2) with corrections and rating gates.
Task.experts: - Secure Platform Architect (Generator) - Compliance and Risk Controller (Critic)
Task.constraints: PCG; numeric ratings for risk/coverage; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Gated protocol with metrics, test hooks, and rollback triggers.

Task.title: Rural Telemedicine Rollout: Coverage vs. Continuity of Care
Task.objective: Conduct a conflict debate to design rollout strategies balancing coverage expansion with continuity and quality of care.
Task.context: Bandwidth constraints, device access, licensure, referral networks, equity in outcomes.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=4) with Step 3A (Conflict), ≥2 rounds with divergence ratings and compromise.
Task.experts: - Rural Health Systems Planner - Clinical Quality and Safety Lead - Digital Infrastructure Engineer - Community Health Advocate
Task.constraints: PCG; ratings and cross-evaluation; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Ranked strategy portfolio with triggers and monitoring.
